question: 放射能
sourceMnemonic: <ja>放射</ja> is "radiation." Add the <kanji>ability</kanji> of radiation and you have <vocabulary>radioactivity</vocabulary>, for some reason. I guess things don't have radioactivity until you have given them the ability of radiation, right?
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
